comment: Nice Person bad teacher Crazy hard tests. Exptects you to write legal briefs, me not a legal mind. Did the best I could and got a C.

Definitely one of the worst professors I've ever had. Completely out of touch with students. Shows up to class late. Reads off of slides she got from the internet. Insanely hard tests. Doesn't help with homework or quizzes. Nice lady but horrible professor.

Caution. Professor has tenure. Brings personal problems to class, is older, crippled and set in her ways. Computer illiterate. However, she was likely a wonderful teacher in the past and is still friendly.
she doesn't teach at all, you pretty much have to read the book word for word, and the homework she requires you to do you don't get help from nor is the material in the book!!!!
Very good teacher, interesting class.. challenging, but lenient
A lot of Material to cover but over all pretty good.
I took Accounting I fall 03'. great professor, knows her stuff.
Do not take this professor, you will learn NOTHING in her class!!

I would recommend her more than the other Accounting teacher. Mrs. Conn is more detailed on her teaching, she knows what she is talking about, take her and not the other one, I had to take this class twice because of the other teacher. If possible take Mrs. Conn during the summer, it is way easier.

Teaches like she is in grade school. Definetly showed favoritism in class. As far as the class goes, just do the homework and you'll be ok. Don't bother with the book, just sign up for the online stuff and get your information from the website.

I had no problem with her, but I know that other students did - it seemed like she had favorite students (I think that I was one of them). If you do the homework she assigns, the tests are easy. Also, I took accounting in high school, so that may have been why the class was a little easier for me.

Rediculous person, this Jeanie Conn.  She kept telling us to "suspend reality" whenever anyone has a seemingly pertinent question.  she was rude to students she didn't like, and clearly showed favor to those she did...she liked me a lot. ha
Silly lady, not very clear and she never lets your ask questions.
She started a on a new book with out checking it out, and when on teaching blindly i did not learn a thing.

Very good professor.  Tried new teaching technique, students didn't like, she changed.  What more can you ask of a professor?  She is also one smart cookie.  Has good real world experience.  Highly recommened.
